sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library"> <x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category>professional_experience</category> <default_for/> <description>have spent at least the last 6 full consecutive months prior to the deadline for applications as an AD official, as an AD temporary agent, as a contract agent in FG IV in the Commission, or as any combination of these categories.</description> <duration_months>6</duration_months> <number>RQL0001021</number> <short_description>FG IV Consecutive [6 months]</short_description> <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-18 08:55:03</sys_created_on> <sys_id>868c4fb2473e6110691e7258946d4311</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>nappoma</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-18 11:05:19</sys_updated_on> </x_431105_cand_ass_requirement_library> </record_update>
